subTitle: A concurrent display technique lifts supplementary content into the viewer's field of vision.

listing.text: Indication of the degree of inconsistency (traffic signal)
Display of valid corrections, clarification of the motivation and intention pursued by the author

summary: The user is able to make an immediate distinction between truthful and misleading content.

subTitle: Exceptionally critical content is removed from the user's field of vision. The procedure is comparable to that of ad blocking technologies - advertising campaigns are removed from a website before they get displayed.

listing.text: Entire hiding of particularly critical content

note: The rendering process does not require any adaptation of existing or accustomed digital workflows, such as the handling of the preferred social media application.

subTitle: The user is provided with an efficient tool that allows the immediate and fast contradiction of critical contents.

listing.text: An intuitive user interface allows the capture of the web and time coordinates of a critical content in any target application.
Smart dialogues support the process of determining the degree of contradiction and its nature.

note: The process of tagging critical content is performed by the average user.
